dcterms:creator: Xiaodan Liang
Ke Gong
Xiaohui Shen
Liang Lin
dcterms:description: LIP is the largest human parsing dataset, which contains 50,462 images with elaborated pixel-wise annotations with 19 semantic human part labels. The images collected from real-world scenarios contain humans appearing with challenging poses and views, heavily occlusions, various appearances, and low-resolutions.
dcterms:title: LIP

dcterms:creator: Xianjie Chen
Roozbeh Mottaghi
Xiaobai Liu
Sanja Fidler
Raquel Urtasun
Alan Yuille
dcterms:description: PASCAL-Person-Part is a relatively small dataset annotated from PASCAL VOC 2010, which contains 1,716 train images and 1,817 validation images. The ground truth label consists of six semantic parts including head, torso, upper/lower arms, upper/lower legs, and one background class.
dcterms:title: PASCAL-Person-Part
